long_description: The BOB Duallie Handlebar Console attaches easily to any BOB Duallie Stroller and features room for 2 water bottles and a zippered compartment for small items such as keys, wallet and phone. 4 rip-and-stick straps for easy and secure attachment to stroller. Made from water- and stain-resistant polyester.
short_description: The BOB Duallie Handlebar Console attaches easily to any BOB Duallie Stroller and features room for 2 water bottles and a zippered compartment for small items such as keys, wallet and phone.
